description.value:
Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Hunt Prey]{Hunt Prey} and select only one prey, you can grant your Hunt Prey benefits and @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Hunter's Edge]{Hunter's Edge} to an ally in addition to gaining them yourself. The ally retains these benefits until you use Hunt Prey again.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision}
